document.full_text: virginia commonwealth's offense has given new meaning to the term march madness and the rams look to lure butler into the same frenetic style when the two teams meet in the ncaa tournament semi-finals on saturday.
document.title: vcu eager to unleash attack-style offense on butler
lines_and_colors: virginia commonwealth's offense has given new meaning to the term march madness and the rams look to lure butler into the same frenetic style when the two teams meet in the ncaa tournament semi-finals on saturday.
